Setting.Label: 100% NG+
Setting.ToolTip: Enable this for the other option bellow. IMPORTANT! the stuff bellow is follows TpRedNinja's 100% splits and route so might not line up with your splits

Setting.Label: Main Story
Setting.ToolTip: Splits for certain mainstory stuff such as 1st troll fight, completeing the story portion of alfheim, and some other place

Setting.Label: Valks
Setting.ToolTip: Splits whenever you gain one of the Valkyrie's helmets

Setting.Label: Side Stuff
Setting.ToolTip: Splits whenever you gain 5, 9, or 18 skap slag such as certain obj, realm tears completion, completing labors/artifact sets, and unlocking a new realm

Setting.Label: Locations
Setting.ToolTip: Splits when you leave Stone falls after first visit and second visit, isle of death, iron cove,foothills going valk area , after atreus kills modi, final climb up the peak 2nd time

Setting.Label: Buri stronghold
Setting.ToolTip: Splits when you leave Buri stronghold and dock at tyr's temple

Setting.Label: All Ravens
Setting.ToolTip: Options for when you want to split when destroying ravens and to autostart

Setting.Label: Every single Raven
Setting.ToolTip: Splits whenever you destroy 1 raven

Setting.Label: Last Raven
Setting.ToolTip: Splits Only when the last Raven is killed

Setting.Label: Miscellaneous
Setting.ToolTip: Miscellaneous settings that doesnt have anything to do with the speedrun check below for option

Setting.Label: Odin Ravens tracker
Setting.ToolTip: Shows how many ravens you have destroyed
